pre_caption: This is a wide scenery shot of an empty room. The video begins with the camera positioned at a low angle in the right foreground, partially behind a white-tiled wall. The view looks across a large, tiled floor that occupies the bottom half of the frame, with a black and white geometric pattern in the middle ground. In the background, dark walls line the space, and an arched doorway is visible slightly left of center. The camera then performs a quick pan to the right, revealing more of the room. This movement shifts the arched doorway to the center-left background and brings a curved wall on the right side of the room into view, which extends from the middle ground to the right edge of the frame.
